org.ingatan.component.librarymanager
Class LibraryEditorDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.LibraryEditorDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class LibraryEditorDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

Provides a dialog allowing the user to edit the name of the library, the description of the library, and to clear the 'correctness' values for all questions that it contains.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

LibraryEditorDialog

public LibraryEditorDialog(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                           boolean newLibrary,
                           java.lang.String groupName)
Creates a new LibraryEditorDialog.

Parameters:
parent - the parent window for this dialog.
newLibrary - whether or not this dialog is being used to create a new library, false if this dialog is being used to edit a library.
groupName - if creating a new library, then it will be added to the specified group. Put this parameter as null if this is not desired.

getClearStatistics

public boolean getClearStatistics()
Gets whether or not the statistics of all questions contained by this library should be cleared.

Returns:
true if the statistics should be cleared.
